Package edu.wpi.disco.plugin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AskHowPassablePlugin
    Plugin to capture common dialogue authoring pattern in which there are several options including doing nothing.
    AskHowPlugin
    Plugin that asks about (applicable, non-rejected, non-internal) decomposition classes.
    AskShouldPassablePlugin
    Plugin to enquire about optional tasks which have live successors (and therefore would be passed if the successors proposed first).
    AskShouldPlugin
    Plugin to enquire about tasks which are not authorized and are either optional or unstarted toplevel or only self can perform.
    AskShouldTopPlugin
    Plugin for agent to ask about first live toplevel plan iff Ask.Should property for task is true (default) and stack is empty.
    AskWhatNoBindingPlugin
    Plugin that asks for first unknown input value of non-primitive task that has no identity binding (since this input will not be asked about later on)
    AskWhatPlugin
    Plugin which asks for first unknown input value of non-utterance task that cannot be done by other actor.
    AskWhoPlugin
    Plugin which asks who should do primitive task with undefined external slot
    AuthorizedPlugin
    Plugin used to execute authorized task for which all inputs known.
    BasePlugin
    Convenient base plugin for defining simple plugin inheritance.
    DecompositionPlugin
    Plugin to explore applicable decompositions to extend set of possible next tasks.
    DefaultPlugin
    Base class for plugins that are not related to any plan.
    EnumerationPlugin
    Abstract class to propose enumerated values.
    ImplicitAcceptPlugin
    Plugin to generate behaviors based on implicit acceptance of current proposal.
    ProposeGlobalPlugin
    Plugin to propose enumerated values for global variable.
    ProposeHowPlugin
    Plugin to propose applicable decompositions.
    ProposeShouldNotPlugin
    Plugin which rejects the current (focus) task and all its parents on stack (within current toplevel plan).
    ProposeShouldOptionalPlugin
    Plugin to include Propose.Should and Propose.ShouldNot for optional steps in user menu.
    ProposeShouldOtherPlugin
    Plugin to propose other actor execute task.
    ProposeShouldPlugin
    Base plugin for generating Propose.Should and subclasses.
    ProposeShouldSelfPlugin
    Plugin which proposes to execute a non-optional task with defined inputs by self or someone.
    ProposeShouldTopPlugin
    Plugin which proposes to execute a non-optional task with defined inputs by self or someone.
    ProposeWhatPlugin
    Plugin to propose enumerated values for slot.
    ProposeWhoPlugin
    Plugin to propose who should perform primitive act.
    RejectProposeWhatPlugin
    Plugin for rejecting the setting of optional inputs.
    RespondPlugin
    Base class for plugins used to accept or reject the current (focus) proposal made by other actor or proposal this actor has been asked to make.
    RespondPlugin.Accept  
    RespondPlugin.Reject  
    SingletonPlugin
    Convenient base plugin for defining plugins which return a single task.
    TopsPlugin
    Plugin to propose non-primitive toplevel plans.
    UtterancePlugin
    TTSay plugin for utterances for which all inputs known.
